artifacts.name: RE-8
artifacts.body: UAV State transitions When requested the _VehicleCore_ shall shall transition the UAV between states according to allowed state transitions as depicted in the UAV state transition diagram

artifacts.name: RE-9
artifacts.body: ListenerNotifications If a client registers for notifications the _UIMiddleware_ shall send notifications for specific events

artifacts.name: RE-25
artifacts.body: UAV Identification The _VehicleCore_ shall assign a unique ID to each activated UAV.

artifacts.name: RE-28
artifacts.body: UAV Flight Plan Execution The _SingleUAVFlightPlanScheduler_ shall only execute one flight plan at a time for each UAV.

artifacts.name: RE-36
artifacts.body: Only one instance of each registered drone may be active any any time The _UAVActivationManager_ shall ensure that only one instance of each registered drone is active at any time.

artifacts.name: RE-38
artifacts.body: UAV type specification assignment The _VehicleCore_ shall associate a {{UAV_TYPE}} for each UAV defining its basic attributes.

artifacts.name: RE-77
artifacts.body: Waypoint definition Each waypoint shall be specified using coordinates that include longitude latitude and altitude.

artifacts.name: RE-80
artifacts.body: Visiting waypoints during flight plan When a flight plan is executed the _VehicleCore_ shall send the next waypoint to the UAV.

artifacts.name: RE-86
artifacts.body: Managed flight plan queue The _SingleUAVFlightPlanScheduler_ shall maintain a managed list of pending flight plans for Each UAV.

artifacts.name: RE-100
artifacts.body: Removal of planned flight If requested the _SingleUAVFlightPlanScheduler_ shall unassign the flight plan assigned to a UAV that is awaiting execution.

artifacts.name: RE-101
artifacts.body: Assigning new flight plan upon completion of previous flight If a UAV has pending flight plans then when it reaches the final waypoint of its current flight plan the _SingleUAVFlightPlanScheduler_ shall execute the next assigned flight plan.

artifacts.name: RE-103
artifacts.body: Remove pending plans when return-to-home When a UAV's current flight is cancelled the _SingleUAVFlightPlanScheduler_ shall in turn cancel all scheduled flight plans for that UAV.

artifacts.name: RE-108
artifacts.body: UI middleware accepts registrations The _UIMiddleware_ shall provide an interface for registering UI clients.

artifacts.name: RE-110
artifacts.body: UAV controlled by only one UI client at a time The _UIMiddleware_ shall only assign one control-client at a time for each UAV.

artifacts.name: RE-112
artifacts.body: UI binding to a UAV If a command is issued by the _VaadinUI_ for an UAV the _VaadinUI_ shall request control of that UAV.

artifacts.name: RE-114
artifacts.body: Display map in UI When the _RealTimeFlightUI_ is loaded a map shall be displayed.

artifacts.name: RE-120
artifacts.body: Real-Time Flight UI The _RealTimeFlightUI_ shall display the location of active UAVs as icons on the map.

artifacts.name: RE-124
artifacts.body: Object Avoidance When a stationary or moving object is within the proximity of a UAV the _ObjectAvoidance_ system shall issue evasive directives to the UAV

artifacts.name: RE-125
artifacts.body: Reach destination while avoiding objects If a UAV takes evasive actions the system will ensure that it will eventually reach its destination

artifacts.name: RE-127
artifacts.body: Onboard obstacle avoidance When a UAV has an active onboard Obstacle Avoidance then the _ObstacleAvoidance_ system shall not issue directives

artifacts.name: RE-160
artifacts.body: Activation of an additional UAV detected by the GCS When a _GCS_ requests activation of a newly detected UAV the _GCSMiddleware_ shall forward the request to Dronology.

artifacts.name: RE-161
artifacts.body: UAV activation The _UAVActivationManager_ shall only activate UAVs that are registered.

artifacts.name: RE-235
artifacts.body: Allow reconnection of GCS to the UAV after disconnecting When the _GCS_ loses the connection to an UAV the _GCS_ shall attempt to reconnect

artifacts.name: RE-424
artifacts.body: Return To Home without detours "When the ""return to home"" command is issued the _FlightManager_ shall return the UAV to its original launch location without issuing any additional waypoint or routing commands."

artifacts.name: RE-501
artifacts.body: Flight route defined as waypoints The _FlightRouteManager_ shall define flight routes as an ordered sequence of waypoints in which the first waypoint represents the first target location and the final waypoint represents the final target location.

artifacts.name: RE-503
artifacts.body: Valid Flight Route The _FlightRouteManager_ shall ensure that all flight routes represent a {{VALID_FLIGHT_ROUTE}}.

artifacts.name: RE-505
artifacts.body: Flight route persistence The _FlightRouteManager_ shall persist flight routes.

artifacts.name: RE-508
artifacts.body: Specify takeoff altitude When a flight route requires a customized takeoff altitude that differs from the system's default takeoff altitude it shall be specified in the flight route.

artifacts.name: RE-510
artifacts.body: Coordinate system conversion When requested the _CoordinateSystem_ shall transform coordinates to alternate formats.

artifacts.name: RE-516
artifacts.body: Calculate distances When given two coordinates the _CoordinateSystem_ shall compute the distance between them.

artifacts.name: RE-517
artifacts.body: Calculate directions When given two coordinates the _CoordinateSystem_ shall compute the direction from the first coordinate to the second coordinate.

artifacts.name: RE-521
artifacts.body: Maintain position during Hover In Place "When the ""hover in place"" command is issued the _FlightManager_ shall halt the UAV in place and maintain its current position."

artifacts.name: RE-523
artifacts.body: Flight route assignment during Hover In Place If a flight route is assigned to a UAV which is currently hovering in place the _FlightManager_ shall assign the route and maintain the hover in place mode.

artifacts.name: RE-525
artifacts.body: Rescinding Hover In Place command "If a flight plan is active and the ""hover in place"" command is rescinded the _FlightManager_ shall notify the UAV to continue to the originally designated waypoint."

artifacts.name: RE-531
artifacts.body: Takeoff Altitude When a flight plan is activated for a UAV currently on the ground the _FlightSchedulingandExecution _shall notify the UAV to takeoff vertically until it reaches the prescribed altitude.

artifacts.name: RE-541
artifacts.body: Predefined flight patterns The _MissionPlanner _shall manage predefined FlightPatterns

artifacts.name: RE-545
artifacts.body: Cancel Mission When requested if a mission is currently active the _MissionPlanner _shall cancel the active mission.

artifacts.name: RE-547
artifacts.body: Flight Plan scheduling When requested the _SingleUAVFlightPlanScheduler_ shall schedule a route for execution.

artifacts.name: RE-549
artifacts.body: Manual Flight Plan Assignment If a route contains a specific {{UAV_ID}} the _SingleUAVFlightPlanScheduler_ shall assign the route to the given UAV.

artifacts.name: RE-551
artifacts.body: Automatic Flight Plan Assignment If a scheduled flight is not manually assigned to a UAV the _SingleUAVFlightPlanScheduler_ shall assign the route automatically to an UAV

artifacts.name: RE-555
artifacts.body: Hover at completion of flight If a UAV does not have any pending flight plans then when it reaches the final waypoint of its current flight plan the _SingleUAVFlightPlanScheduler_ shall notify the UAV to hover in place.

artifacts.name: RE-558
artifacts.body: Cancel active plan If requested the _SingleUAVFlightPlanScheduler_ shall abort the currently executing flight plan of an UAV

artifacts.name: RE-562
artifacts.body: Pattern-based flight path A flight pattern shall document the longitude latitude and altitude of waypoints in a flight route as offsets from the starting position of the UAV.

artifacts.name: RE-574
artifacts.body: Support for GCS connected UAVs The _VehicleCore_ shall support UAVs connected via the _GCS_

artifacts.name: RE-576
artifacts.body: Support for internally simulated UAVs The _VehicleCore_ shall support virtual UAVs

artifacts.name: RE-587
artifacts.body: Deactivates Physical UAVs When a UAV is deactivated the _UAVActivationManager_ shall cancel all current and scheduled flight plans

artifacts.name: RE-589
artifacts.body: Establish maximum number of activated UAVs When the maximum numbers of allowed activated UAVs has been reached the _UAVActivationManager_ shall reject any further activation requests.

artifacts.name: RE-592
artifacts.body: UAV Registration The _UAVRegistrationManager_ shall store UAV meta-data information such as the UAV's technical characteristics

artifacts.name: RE-594
artifacts.body: Simulate takeoff When given a takeoff command the _InternalSimulator_ shall move the UAV to the takeoff altitude corresponding to its current longitude and latitude.

artifacts.name: RE-595
artifacts.body: Simulate goto When given a goto command the _InternalSimulator_ shall update the location of the UAV at increments of {{SIMULATION_STEP_SIZE}} meters moving it towards the target destination until the destination is reached.

artifacts.name: RE-596
artifacts.body: Simulate land When given a landing command the _InternalSimulator_ shall move the UAV from to the ground altitude corresponding to its current longitude and latitude.

artifacts.name: RE-597
artifacts.body: Simulate battery The _InternalSimulator_ shall approximate the state of the battery

artifacts.name: RE-611
artifacts.body: Logging of Flight Plan related Events The _ActivityLogger_ shall log all flight plan related events.

artifacts.name: RE-616
artifacts.body: Logging of GCS related events The _ActivityLogger_ shall log all commands sent to and messages received from a _CGS_.
